tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VBN Forced) (PP (TO to) (NP (NN witness))) (PP (TO to) (NP (NP (JJ heated) (NNS debates)) (PP (IN between) (NP (NNS friends))))) (PP (IN over) (NP (JJ controversial) (NNS issues)))) (. .)))
